tool_description: Share Market News API is an API that provides access to Real-time and historical news articles related to Indian share market, finance and business. The API allows developers to access and integrate news articles from multiple sources with their applications and software systems. It can be used for stock market analysis, financial journalism, and building custom financial news feeds.
name: Share Market News API (India)
title: Share Market News API (India)

api_list.name: Get all Indian stock market news
api_list.description: This end point will return all the headlines , specific news from Indian share market  and Economy.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://share-market-news-api-india.p.rapidapi.com/marketNews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "share-market-news-api-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://share-market-news-api-india.p.rapidapi.com/marketNews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "share-market-news-api-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
